product_name: OllyDog Olly Bone II Dog Toy - 2014 Closeout
long_description: No sticks to throw for Rover at the beach? Bring the Olly Bone II Dog Toy from OllyDog. Tough and colorful, this bone-shaped bumper toy is great for fetching, tugging, catching and throwing. Webbing handle is integrated into the design for strength. Durable multilayer construction and 10-in. length. Closeout.
short_description: No sticks to throw for Rover at the beach? Bring the Olly Bone II Dog Toy from OllyDog. Tough and colorful, this bone-shaped bumper toy is great for fetching, tugging, catching and throwing.
